post.description: This API updates multiple contracts at once.

get.description: This API lists credits cycles recorded for a contract, based on the filter/duration specified. For now only the @CURRENT@ filter is supported, so API will fetch details of the contractâ€™s current credit cycle.

parameters.name: creditCycle
parameters.description: This param filters the credit cycles based on the value passed,Allowed values for this filter are @CURRENT@

schema.description: This param filters the credit cycles based on the value passed,Allowed values for this filter are @CURRENT@

get.description: To get a list of contracts

post.description: This API creates a contract in your helpdesk.

get.description: This API fetches a single contract from your helpdesk.

patch.description: This API updates details of an existing contact.

post.description: This API terminates the active contract.

get.summary: Get contract count by custom view and department
get.description: This API return the count of contract based on the custom view and department specified. If ownerId is specified, it will return the count of contracts owned by the owner in the specified department.
